reviewText: Used this in the '90's..... Lost 80 lbs under the care of Tony Little.......  Love it
This came rather quick. It works very well, and is a great value. If you really stick to it, you'll be really surprised by the results. The pounds and inches that drop are actually incredible.

The quality of the video isn't the greatest.  I mute it and listen to music while watching the video, but it's the BEST 15-minute workout I have found so far.  I have a pear-shaped body and have really seen results with thinner thighs after using this video regularly.
